titles.title: Providing for bipartisan subpoena authority during the 116th Congress.
Providing for bipartisan subpoena authority during the 116th Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: This resolution provides that in all matters referred to by the Speaker of the House in her announcement on September 24, 2019, of an impeachment inquiry of the President, the chairmen and ranking minority members of all committees involved shall have coequal subpoena power.
